page.title: 11GROVE HUNT-ORGANISATION.
page.content: The Grove and Rufford Hunt is supported by a mounted field of up to 100,but more usually by about 50.There will often be a rather larger number of people following in cars.This is particularly so for the traditional Boxing Day spectacle.Cub Hunting is an informal sort of hunting,taking place very early in the morning, and in September and October.It is during this period that the contol of the fox population is achieved.Proper hunting usually starts at 11.00.The meet for fox hunting is normally a village pub.Occasionally the Hunt is entertained at a private house,this is called a lawn meeting.The hounds are always counted in couples and the Hunt currently has 20 couples.They are mainly English foxhounds,but there is an increasing infusion of Welsh blood lines.
